page.title: 13Home Life.
page.content: A Typical Saturday. My mum and dad get up first at five o'clock to tend to the animals and see if any sheep have lambed. Then Jaqueline and I get up at seven o'clock. Mum cooks the breakfast then I go and put the goats out.I help dad muck out and feed the bullocks and put Buttercup the cow out. I get Laddie the dog out and go round the stock in a Land Rover, while Mum and Jaqueline make the lunch. We have chips and hamburgers. Then mum goes to the shop to buy the milk bread and our comics. Jaqueline and I wash the dishes. Then I play on my own or I watch televison. I help mum make the tea which is sandwiches scones and ginger bread. After tea I ride my bike. When I come back I have my bath then I watch television and then I go to bed.
